english.segment1: Riots in the streets. Riots for revolution. People on their knees. Praying for revolution
english.segment2: Children overseas. Fighting for revolution. Soldiers cut and bleed. Dying for revolution
english.segment4: Politicians and priests. Fathers of revolution. Businessmen and beasts. Fathers of revolution
english.segment5: The hungry cry and plead. Pleading for redistribution. Change for all in need. Much needed revolution
english.segment6: Waiting for Revolution, Redistribution. Waiting for Consideration, Emancipation. Waiting for Reconciliation, Reallocation. Waiting for Demonstration, Salvation
english.segment7: Lie awake at night. Comfort, too afraid to fight. Eyes not accustomed to sight. Wings not used to flight
english.segment8: Slavery and Abundance coming near. Resisting Revolution. Arrogance and Fear. Death to Revolution
